DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate toxicity profile and efficacy of a tandem autologous-nonmyeloablative transplant approach in newly diagnose myeloma patients younger than 65 years
DOC.brief_title: Tandem Autologous- Nonmyeloablative Allogeneic Transplant for Newly Diagnosed Multiple Myeloma (Trapianto Tandem Autologo-Allogenico Non Mieloablativo Nel Mieloma Alla Diagnosi)
